name: Jaimie Boyd
body:
Jaimie Boyd@jaimieboyd30 Sep 2022For#NDTRtoday I was lucky to have space and time to reflect and remember the children. I went for a trail run in one of my favourite places and learnt about#indigenomics- fabulous book! 

So grateful to get to live and play in this beautiful place.1
